meanings.definition: One who helps or assists another person.
meanings.sent1: The kind helpers at the shelter always lend a hand to those in need.
meanings.sent2: The helpers in the classroom assist the teacher with various tasks.
meanings.sent3: The helpers at the party made sure everyone had a good time.
meanings.sent4: The little girl's smile was her best helper in making new friends.
meanings.sent5: The helpers in the community garden work together to grow fresh vegetables for everyone.

meanings.definition: A device or tool used to aid in a task or process.
meanings.sent1: The calculator is a helpful helper when solving math problems.
meanings.sent2: The screwdriver is a useful helper for assembling furniture.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen timer proved to be a lifesaver helper when baking cookies.
meanings.sent4: The flashlight became my trusty helper during the power outage.
meanings.sent5: The compass was a reliable helper in guiding us through the forest.
